name: CrossReferences
shortdesc: A collection of index cross references. &#40;For cross references in text, use the 'cross reference source' and 'hyperlink' objects.)

parameter.name: referencedTopic
parameter.shortdesc: The topic that the cross reference points to.

parameter.name: customTypeString
parameter.shortdesc: The custom string to use in the cross reference. Valid only for custom cross reference types. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: withProperties
parameter.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new CrossReference &#40;Optional)

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the CrossReference.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the CrossReference with the specified index or name.

parameter.name: index
parameter.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the CrossReference with the specified name.

method.name: itemByID
method.shortdesc: Returns the CrossReference with the specified ID.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the CrossReferences within the specified range.

parameter.name: from
parameter.shortdesc: The CrossReference, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: CrossReference, Long Integer or String.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The CrossReference, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: CrossReference, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first CrossReference in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last CrossReference in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle CrossReference in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the CrossReference with the index previous to the specified index.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The index of the CrossReference that follows the desired CrossReference.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the CrossReference whose index follows the specified CrossReference in the collection.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The CrossReference whose index comes before the desired CrossReference.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any CrossReference in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every CrossReference in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the CrossReference.
Returns the CrossReference with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
